objects.src: <svg width='1080' height='1080' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><defs><linearGradient id='bgGradient' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#1E1E1E;stop-opacity:1'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#000000;stop-opacity:1'/></linearGradient><linearGradient id='accentGradient' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#E01F3D;stop-opacity:1'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#B71C1C;stop-opacity:1'/></linearGradient></defs><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='url(#bgGradient)'/><g opacity='0.1'><rect x='540' y='0' width='540' height='1080' fill='#333333'/></g><circle cx='100' cy='200' r='60' fill='url(#accentGradient)' opacity='0.4'/><circle cx='980' cy='900' r='80' fill='url(#accentGradient)' opacity='0.3'/><circle cx='200' cy='800' r='40' fill='url(#accentGradient)' opacity='0.2'/><g opacity='0.6'><rect x='0' y='350' width='100' height='4' rx='2' fill='#FFFFFF'/><rect x='0' y='370' width='70' height='4' rx='2' fill='#FFFFFF'/><rect x='0' y='390' width='40' height='4' rx='2' fill='#FFFFFF'/></g><g opacity='0.6'><rect x='980' y='250' width='100' height='4' rx='2' fill='#FFFFFF'/><rect x='980' y='270' width='70' height='4' rx='2' fill='#FFFFFF'/><rect x='980' y='290' width='40' height='4' rx='2' fill='#FFFFFF'/></g><g transform='translate(800, 100) rotate(45)'><rect x='0' y='0' width='200' height='3' fill='#E01F3D' opacity='0.5'/><rect x='0' y='20' width='150' height='3' fill='#E01F3D' opacity='0.5'/><rect x='0' y='40' width='100' height='3' fill='#E01F3D' opacity='0.5'/></g><g transform='translate(100, 950) rotate(-45)'><rect x='0' y='0' width='200' height='3' fill='#E01F3D' opacity='0.5'/><rect x='0' y='20' width='150' height='3' fill='#E01F3D' opacity='0.5'/><rect x='0' y='40' width='100' height='3' fill='#E01F3D' opacity='0.5'/></g></svg>

objects.text:
• Active Noise Cancellation
• Up to 24 Hours Battery Life
• Sweat & Water Resistant

product_details.description: Custom acoustic platform delivers powerful, balanced sound Control your sound with two distinct listening modes: Active Noise Cancelling (ANC) and Transparency mode Three soft ear tip sizes for a stable and comfortable fit while ensuring an optimum acoustic seal Up to 8 hours of listening time (up to 24 hours combined with pocket-sized charging case) Industry-leading Class 1 Bluetooth for extended range and fewer dropouts High-quality call performance and voice assistant interaction via built-in microphones IPX4-rated sweat- and water-resistant wireless earbuds Beats wireless headphones and earphones are compatible with Apple and Android devices What’s in the box – Beats Studio Buds true wireless noise cancelling earphones, charging case, ear tips with three size options, USB-C to USB-C charging cable, Quick Start Guide, warranty card (USB-C power adapter sold separately) Brand - Beats ** Color - Black ** Ear Placement - In Ear ** Form Factor - In Ear, True Wireless ** Noise Control - Active Noise Cancellation, Sound Isolation **

banner_details:
This banner is a modern product promotional design featuring a high-contrast layout divided into left and right sections. The left side contains all textual content with strong hierarchy. The topmost heading (`heading`) is in bold white font with a red accent on the first word. Below it, the tagline (`tagline`) is styled in futuristic red font, emphasizing wireless technology. A feature list (`description`) follows in a clean white sans-serif. Prominently beneath is a large price tag (`price`) in bold white. Underneath, a red call-to-action button (`cta_background` and `cta`) urges users to shop. The right side contains a high-resolution image (`product_image`) of sleek black earbuds slightly angled for visual interest. The background (`background`) blends dark gradients with subtle linear and circular elements in red and white for dynamic depth.

**Color Palette:**
- Background Gradient: #1E1E1E → #000000  
- Accent Red: #E01F3D  
- Deep Red: #B71C1C  
- White: #FFFFFF  
- Gray Overlay: #333333 (used subtly on right)
product_color: The product image showcases sleek, matte black wireless earbuds with a smooth, modern design. The dominant color is a deep matte black (#0A0A0A), giving the product a premium and minimalist look. Accents of light gray (#D7D7D7) are used in the logo, providing subtle contrast and enhancing brand visibility. A soft white LED indicator (#F1F1F1) adds a futuristic touch. The blending of different black tones creates depth, while the muted contrast emphasizes elegance and simplicity. Ideal colors for an advertisement banner include matte black (#0A0A0A), light gray (#D7D7D7), soft white (#F1F1F1), and a shadow gray (#1E1E1E) for gradient effects and highlights.
